entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 32. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 49 in the evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
